TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit EmptyControlCollection extends System.Web.UI.ControlCollection

summary.span: 為永遠都是空的 集合提供標準支援。

span.span: Provides standard support for a collection that is always empty.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個類別是當您想要定義的自訂控制項，不允許子控制項。This class is used when you want to define a custom control that does not allow child controls. ## Examples [!code-csharp[SystemWebUI_EmptyControlCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/SystemWebUI_EmptyControlCollection/CS/emptycontrolcollection.cs#1)] [!code-vb[SystemWebUI_EmptyControlCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/SystemWebUI_EmptyControlCollection/VB/emptycontrolcollection.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Web.UI.Control owner) cil managed

param.name: owner
param.span: ，擁有這個集合做為子控制項的集合。

span.span: The that owns this collection as its collection of child controls.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format:
## Examples 下列程式碼範例會嘗試填入造成例外狀況的子控制項的控制項。The following code example attempts to populate a control with child controls, causing an exception. 這是因為容器控制項不允許子控制項。This is because the container control does not allow child controls. 以下是用來建置可執行檔的命令列。The following is the command line used to build the executable. ```vb vbc /r:System.dll /r:System.Web.dll /t:library /out:myWebAppPath/bin/vb_myEmptyControlCollection.dll myEmptyControlCollection.vb ``` ```csharp csc /t:library /out:myWebAppPath/bin/cs_myEmptyControlCollection.dll myEmptyControlCollection.cs ``` [!code-csharp[SystemWebUI_EmptyControlCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/SystemWebUI_EmptyControlCollection/CS/emptycontrolcollection.cs#1)] [!code-vb[SystemWebUI_EmptyControlCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/SystemWebUI_EmptyControlCollection/VB/emptycontrolcollection.vb#1)] 下列程式碼範例會使用以上定義的空白自訂控制項。The following code example uses the empty custom control defined above. 執行此範例中，您會收到例外狀況。When running this example, you will get an exception. 請注意，中顯示的值`Register`指示詞反映上一個命令列。Notice that the values shown in the `Register` directive reflect the previous command line. ```vb <%@ Register TagPrefix="custom" Assembly="vb_myEmptyControlCollection" Namespace="CustomControls" %>

Using an Empty Control

``` ```csharp <%@ Register TagPrefix="custom" Assembly="cs_myEmptyControlCollection" Namespace="CustomControls" %>

Using an Empty Control

```

summary.span: 拒絕將指定的 物件加入到集合中。

span.span: Denies the addition of the specified object to the collection.

exception.span: 永遠發出，這是因為控制項不允許子控制項。

span.span: Always issued, because the control does not allow child controls.
